channel.title: CVE Feed for Facebook -- mvfst
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Facebook -- mvfst

item.title: CVE-2021-24029|2024-08-03T19:21:17.115Z -- facebook -- mvfst
item.description: A packet of death scenario is possible in mvfst via a specially crafted message during a QUIC session, which causes a crash via a failed assertion. Per QUIC specification, this particular message should be treated as a connection error. This issue affects mvfst versions prior to commit a67083ff4b8dcbb7ee2839da6338032030d712b0 and proxygen versions prior to v2021.03.15.00.
